Service Details: - Offers resource and referral service for mental health and addiction issues - Provides a supportive listening ear for people in emotional distress - Provides online information on topics including screening self-tests, mental well-being, depression and anxiety, alcohol and other drugs, schizophrenia and psychosis, eating disorders, and supporting a love one - To provide quicker access, resources are categorized under Individuals, Family Members, Professionals, and Connected to School or Campus?
